member.name: F:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionDefaults.AuthenticationScheme
member.summary: Gets the default scheme used by the introspection middleware.

member.name: T:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents
member.summary: Allows customization of introspection handling within the middleware.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.OnCreateTicket
member.summary: Invoked when a ticket is to be created from an introspection response.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.OnRetrieveToken
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be parsed from a newly-received request.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.OnRequestTokenIntrospection
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be sent to the authorization server for introspection.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.OnValidateToken
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be validated, before final processing.

member.name: M:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.CreateTicket(Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.CreateTicketContext)
member.summary: Invoked when a ticket is to be created from an introspection response.

member.name: M:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.RetrieveToken(Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RetrieveTokenContext)
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be parsed from a newly-received request.

member.name: M:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.RequestTokenIntrospection(Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RequestTokenIntrospectionContext)
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be sent to the authorization server for introspection.

member.name: M:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionEvents.ValidateToken(Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.ValidateTokenContext)
member.summary: Invoked when a token is to be validated, before final processing.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.Audiences
member.summary: Gets or sets the intended audiences of this resource server. Setting this property is recommended when the authorization server issues access tokens for multiple distinct resource servers.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the base address of the OAuth2/OpenID Connect server.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.IntrospectionEndpoint
member.summary: Gets or sets the address of the introspection endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client identifier representing the resource server.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret used to communicate with the introspection endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.SaveToken
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean determining whether the access token should be stored in the after a successful authentication process.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.Cache
member.summary: Gets or sets the cache used to store the authentication tickets resolved from the access tokens received by the resource server.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.Events
member.summary: Gets or sets the object provided by the application to process events raised by the authentication middleware. The application may implement the interface fully, or it may create an instance of and assign delegates only to the events it wants to process.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.HttpClient
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP client used to communicate with the remote OAuth2/OpenID Connect server.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.Logger
member.summary: Gets or sets the logger used by . When unassigned, a default instance is created using the logger factory.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.SystemClock
member.summary: Gets or sets the clock used to determine the current date/time.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.AccessTokenFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the data format used to serialize and deserialize the authenticated tickets stored in the distributed cache.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions.DataProtectionProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the data protection provider used to create the default data protectors used by .

member.name: T:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.CreateTicketContext
member.summary: Allows interception of the AuthenticationTicket creation process.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.CreateTicketContext.Payload
member.summary: Gets the payload extracted from the introspection response.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.CreateTicketContext.Ticket
member.summary: Gets or sets the created by the application.

member.name: T:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RequestTokenIntrospectionContext
member.summary: Allows for custom handling of the call to the Authorization Server's Introspection endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RequestTokenIntrospectionContext.Client
member.summary: An for use by the application to call the authorization server.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RequestTokenIntrospectionContext.Message
member.summary: Gets the HTTP message sent to the introspection endpoint.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RequestTokenIntrospectionContext.Token
member.summary: The access token parsed from the client request.

member.name: T:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RetrieveTokenContext
member.summary: Allows custom parsing of access tokens from requests.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RetrieveTokenContext.Token
member.summary: Gets or sets the access token.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.RetrieveTokenContext.Ticket
member.summary: Gets or sets the created by the application.

member.name: T:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.ValidateTokenContext
member.summary: Allows customization of the token validation logic.

member.name: P:Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.ValidateTokenContext.Ticket
member.summary: Gets or sets the created from the introspection response.

member.name: T:Owin.OAuthIntrospectionExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods used to configure the OAuth2 introspection middleware in an OWIN/Katana pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.OAuthIntrospectionExtensions.UseOAuthIntrospection(Owin.IAppBuilder,System.Action{Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions})
member.summary: Adds a new instance of the OAuth2 introspection middleware in the OWIN/Katana pipeline.
member.param: The delegate used to configure the introspection options.

member.name: M:Owin.OAuthIntrospectionExtensions.UseOAuthIntrospection(Owin.IAppBuilder,Owin.Security.OAuth.Introspection.OAuthIntrospectionOptions)
member.summary: Adds a new instance of the OAuth2 introspection middleware in the OWIN/Katana pipeline.
member.param: The options used to configure the introspection middleware.
